items.sentence: It\'s hard to believe that Tom really did that.
It\'s no use trying to persuade Tom to do that.
You don\'t have to do what Tom tells you to do.
I think it\'s time for me to abandon that plan.
I think it\'s time for me to clean the chimney.
Why didn\'t you tell me Tom doesn\'t like Mary?
Why are you in such a hurry to sell your house?
Don\'t pay attention to anything they tell you.
Tom has a history of alcohol and drug problems.
Tom wasn\'t sure if he\'d done the right thing.
